title:
Nonexistence of positive supersolutions for semilinear fractional
  elliptic equations in exterior domains
abstract:
This article is concerned regarding the nonexistence of positive solutions
for nonlinear fractional elliptic inequalities in exterior domains of $\mathbb
R^n$, $n\geq1$.
  We would like to highlight the fact that our results are new with very weak
assumption on the nonlinear term appearing in the inequalities.
  The results are also novel in this generality
  even if the whole space is considered.
